text:
[Verse]
Sunrise to sunset we play
Raindrops come down it's okay
Bare feet on the pavement sway
Lost in the wet windy day

[Verse 2]
Splashing in puddles so wide
Water in our stride and pride
Laughing as we dance and glide
Feel the joy we can't hide

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain together
Every drop makes it better
In the storm we find our tether
Soaking wet but light as a feather

[Verse 3]
Clouds above no reason for gloom
Each drop like a flower blooms
Under the storm we're in tune
Making memories this afternoon

[Bridge]
Umbrellas left behind who cares
Waves of rain wash away all our fears
Thunder echoes but we're here
In this moment crystal clear

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain together
Every drop makes it better
In the storm we find our tether
Soaking wet but light as a feather
title: Dancing in the Rain
